#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<limits.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long   i, t, n, N,  *ans, mod=8388608;
	scanf("%lld", &t);
	ans = new long long  [t];
	for(i=0; i<t; i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld", &N);
		ans[i]=0;
		for(n =1; n<=(min((int)N, 24)); n++)
		{
			ans[i] = (ans[i]%mod + (((long long)pow(2,n-1))%mod)*((((n)*(n+1))/2)%mod)%mod)%mod;
		}
	}
	for(i=0;i<t; i++)
		printf("%lld\n", ans[i]);
	delete [] ans;
	return 0;
}
